moduleMetadataJson.name: Firefox Webcam Chat on Privileged Javascript Shell
moduleMetadataJson.description: This module allows streaming a webcam from a privileged Firefox Javascript shell.
author: joev <joev@metasploit.com>

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: SESSION
options.description: The session to run this module on.

options.name: JsObfuscate
options.description: Number of times to obfuscate JavaScript

options.name: VISIBLE
options.description: Show a window containing the chat to the target

options.name: TIMEOUT
options.description: End the chat session after this many seconds

options.name: ICESERVER
options.description: The ICE server that sets up the P2P connection
